checksum.description: Generate a checksum for a Spot contract

docs.description: Preview Spot contract as OpenAPI3 documentation. The documentation server will start on http://localhost:8080.

generate.description: Runs a generator on an API. Used to produce client libraries, server boilerplates and well-known API contract formats such as OpenAPI.
examples: $ spot generate --contract api.ts --language yaml --generator openapi3 --out output/

contract.name: contract
contract.description: Path to a TypeScript Contract definition

out.name: out
out.description: Directory in which to output generated files

init.description: Generates the boilerplate for an API.
examples:
$ spot init
Generated the following files:
- api.ts
- tsconfig.json
- package.json

mock.description: Run a mock server based on a Spot contract

proxyBaseUrl.name: proxyBaseUrl
proxyBaseUrl.description: If set, the server will act as a proxy and fetch data from the given remote server instead of mocking it

proxyFallbackBaseUrl.name: proxyFallbackBaseUrl
proxyFallbackBaseUrl.description: Like proxyBaseUrl, except used when the requested API does not match defined SPOT contract. If unset, 404 will always be returned.

proxyMockBaseUrl.name: proxyMockBaseUrl
proxyMockBaseUrl.description: Like proxyBaseUrl, except used to proxy draft endpoints instead of returning mocked responses.

port.name: port
port.description: Port on which to run the mock server

pathPrefix.name: pathPrefix
pathPrefix.description: Prefix to prepend to each endpoint path

validation-server.description: Start the spot contract validation server

port.name: port
port.description: The port where application will be available
